root.name: Legend of Xanadu II
root.description: OverviewLegend of Xanadu II is a direct squeal to the original Legend of Xanadu developed and published by Falcom for the PC Engine-CD in 1995. The game is the final entry in Falcom's Dragon Slayer franchise and the fourth installment in the Xanadu series of action RPGs. In 2009 Falcom re-released Legend of Xanadu II on the Wii's Virtual Console.
